See {batchIds}."},"getBatchIdAtIndex(uint256)":{"details":"See {getBaseURICount}.","params":{"_index":"ID of a token."}}},"stateVariables":{"baseURI":{"details":"Mapping from id of a batch of tokens => to base URI for the respective batch of tokens."},"batchIds":{"details":"Largest tokenId of each batch of tokens with the same baseURI."}},"title":"Batch-mint Metadata","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"getBaseURICount()":{"notice":"Returns the count of batches of NFTs."},"getBatchIdAtIndex(uint256)":{"notice":"Returns the ID for the batch of tokens the given tokenId belongs to."}},"notice":"The `BatchMintMetadata` is a contract extension for any base NFT contract. getBaseURICount().details: Each batch of tokens has an in ID and an associated `baseURI`.                  See {batchIds}.

getBaseURICount().notice: Returns the count of batches of NFTs.

getBatchIdAtIndex(uint256).notice: Returns the ID for the batch of tokens the given tokenId belongs to.

documentation.text: @dev Largest tokenId of each batch of tokens with the same baseURI.
@dev Mapping from id of a batch of tokens => to base URI for the respective batch of tokens.
@dev Returns the id for the batch of tokens the given tokenId belongs to.
@dev Returns the baseURI for a token. The intended metadata URI for the token is baseURI + tokenId.
@dev Sets the base URI for the batch of tokens with the given batchId.
@dev Mints a batch of tokenIds and associates a common baseURI to all those Ids.
